title: Stock market today: Dow, S&P 500, Nasdaq futures plummet as Amazon's earnings flop set to deepen tech rout
title_zh: 今日股市：道琼斯指数、标准普尔 500 指数、纳斯达克期货暴跌，亚马逊盈利惨淡将加深科技股溃败
summary: Futures fell with Wall Street in the throes of a sell-off driven by tech earnings and AI spending.
summary_zh: 随着华尔街在科技盈利和人工智能支出推动的抛售阵痛中，期货下跌。

title: Wall Street ends sharply down as AI worries weigh
title_zh: 由于对人工智能的担忧，华尔街股市大幅下跌
summary: STORY: U.S. stocks ended sharply lower on Thursday, with the Dow and S&P 500 each losing 1.2% and the tech-heavy Nasdaq shedding 1.6%.The tech selloff continued on investor concerns about heavy spending on artificial intelligence ...
summary_zh: 故事：美国股市周四大幅收低，道指和标准普尔 500 指数分别下跌 1.2%，以科技股为主的纳斯达克指数下跌 1.6%。由于投资者担心人工智能方面的巨额支出，科技股继续遭到抛售……

title: Amazon CEO Andy Jassy plans to 'invest aggressively' in AI
title_zh: 亚马逊首席执行官安迪·贾西计划“积极投资”人工智能
summary: In its fourth quarter earnings release, Amazon (AMZN) revealed it plans to spend $200 billion on capex in 2026. On the earnings call, Amazon CEO Andy Jassy explains why with AI, the company sees "a very unusual opportunity" and plans to "invest aggressively."
summary_zh: 亚马逊 (AMZN) 在其第四季度财报中透露，计划在 2026 年花费 2000 亿美元的资本支出。在财报电话会议上，亚马逊首席执行官安迪·贾西 (Andy Jassy) 解释了为什么在人工智能方面，该公司看到了“一个非常不寻常的机会”，并计划“积极投资”。

title: Earnings live: Strategy gets caught in bitcoin crash, Amazon stock plunges, Roblox surges
title_zh: 财报直播：策略陷入比特币崩盘、亚马逊股价暴跌、Roblox 飙升
summary: More Big Tech earnings rolled in from Amazon and Alphabet.
summary_zh: 更多大型科技公司的盈利来自亚马逊和 Alphabet。

title: IPOs: How companies get into an index when planning to go public
title_zh: 首次公开募股：公司计划上市时如何进入指数
summary: Elon Musk's SpaceX (SPAX.PVT) acquired his other private venture, the artificial intelligence developer xAI, earlier this week. This comes ahead of the private space company's IPO, expected later this year, as the mega merger now propels the company's value to $1.25 trillion.
summary_zh: 埃隆·马斯克 (Elon Musk) 的 SpaceX (SPAX.PVT) 本周早些时候收购了他的另一家私人企业——人工智能开发商 xAI。这家私人航天公司预计将于今年晚些时候进行首次公开​​募股，此次大型合并现已将公司的价值推至 1.25 万亿美元。

title: Amazon tops Q4 revenue, forecasts $200B in capex for 2026
title_zh: 亚马逊第四季度营收位居榜首，预计 2026 年资本支出将达到 200B 美元
summary: E-commerce giant Amazon (AMZN) released its fourth quarter earnings results after Thursday's closing bell, just missing Wall Street's forecast for adjusted earnings ($1.95 per share vs. estimates of $1.96) while topping net sales expectations ($213.39 billion vs.
summary_zh: 电子商务巨头亚马逊 (AMZN) 在周四收盘后公布了第四季度财报，略低于华尔街的调整后盈利预期（每股 1.95 美元，预期为 1.96 美元），同时高于净销售额预期（每股 2,133.9 亿美元，预期为 1.96 美元）。

title: Apple’s Cook Talks Immigration, Succession and AI at Meeting
title_zh: 苹果库克在会议上谈论移民、继任和人工智能
summary: “I’ve heard from some of you that don’t feel comfortable leaving your homes,” Cook said during an all-hands meeting with staff on Thursday.
summary_zh: 库克在周四与员工举行的全体会议上表示：“我听说你们中的一些人不愿意离开家。”

title: Dow falls sharply, Hims' Wegovy rival, Nio's profit outlook
title_zh: 道琼斯指数大幅下跌，希姆斯的Wegovy竞争对手，蔚来的盈利前景
summary: Yahoo Finance Anchor Josh Lipton tracks today's top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute, including the sharp decline for the three major indexes (^DJI, ^IXIC, ^GSPC), Hims & Hers (HIMS) launching a cheaper copycat version of Novo Nordisk's (NVO) Wego...
summary_zh: 雅虎财经主播乔什·利普顿 (Josh Lipton) 在本《市场分钟》中追踪今日走势最强劲的股票和最大的市场故事，包括三大指数 (^DJI、^IXIC、^GSPC) 的大幅下跌、Hims & Hers (HIMS) 推出诺和诺德 (NVO) Wego 的廉价山寨版……

title: What Alphabet's earnings reveal about the decline in software stocks
title_zh: Alphabet 的财报揭示了软件股下跌的原因
summary: Alphabet (GOOG, GOOGL) reported fourth quarter earnings that topped Wall Street estimates on both the top and bottom lines.
summary_zh: Alphabet（GOOG、GOOGL）公布的第四季度收益在营收和利润上均超过了华尔街的预期。
